com.vectorprint.report.itext.style

Interface DocumentStyler<RD extends ReportDataHolder>

  • Type Parameters:
    RD -
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseStyler, Cloneable, DocumentAware, Observer, com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, ReportDataAware<RD>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentSettings

    public interface DocumentStyler<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
extends com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, BaseStyler, DocumentAware, ReportDataAware<RD>
    Responsible for setting properties of the document such as page size, margins, encryption etc.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.BaseStyler
